title: ‘Do No Harm’: OB-GYNs Weigh the Legal Impact of Abortion Bans - The New York Times
description: As anti-abortion laws take effect across the country, doctors treating patients with high-risk pregnancies are facing difficult decisions — and legal risks — over their standards of care.
text_headers:
‘Do No Harm’: OB-GYNs Weigh the Legal Impact of Abortion Bans
As anti-abortion laws take effect across the country, doctors treating patients with high-risk pregnancies are facing difficult decisions — and legal risks — over their standards of care.
